job.title: Sr. Software Engineer
job.description:
Every day, Global Payments makes it possible for millions of people to move money between buyers and sellers using our payments solutions for credit, debit, prepaid and merchant services. Our worldwide team helps over 3 million companies, more than 1,300 financial institutions and over 600 million cardholders grow with confidence and achieve amazing results. We are driven by our passion for success and we are proud to deliver best-in-class payment technology and software solutions. Join our dynamic team and make your mark on the payments technology landscape of tomorrow.
Primary Responsibilities
Help maintain and extend existing applications written in Laravel 5/6/7, MySQL, Vue & jQuery
Develop and maintain publicly consumable packages to make it easy to integrate to our services
Architect and evolve evergreen projects using the latest versions of Laravel and Vue
Required Skills/Knowledge
Extensive experience with PHP & Laravel 5.x and greater.
Experienced in designing and maintaining MySQL databases
Experience with testing and test-driven workflows (PHPUnit)
Working with Git (Github) and common Git based workflows
Advanced knowledge building RESTful APIs
Comfortable developing in a Linux environment
Motivated to contribute and release to open source software
Comfortable in a fast paced, evolving environment
Hands on, passionate and persistent
Extremely comfortable with CLIs
Strong JS skillset (Vue or React, Vanilla, ES6/7)
Strong desire to evolve, progress, learn, and collaborate
Bonus Skills/Knowledge
Docker
AWS/Vapor
Active and involved with the Laravel community
Experience in the payment acceptance industry
Familiar with PCI DSS
Benefits
The chance to make a huge impact on a business
Direct involvement in all aspects of the product’s development
Ability to work on a forward focused tech-stack
Competitive salary, based on experience.
401K
Health/Dental/Vision Insurance
